ValidationRule.description: Next action date is mandatory if task type is sales call
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c ,'Sales Call'), TODAY() >= DATE(2019,09,09) , ISBLANK(Next_Action_Date__c), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'Booked')), NOT( ISPICKVAL(Call_Status__c, 'Follow Up- NC')), NOT( ISPICKVAL(Call_Status__c, 'DND')), NOT( ISPICKVAL(Call_Status__c,'Not Interested')))
